SEARCH

Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
Represents the manager for all Sounds of the game. Can play and stop individual Sounds.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SoundManager()
    Initializes a SoundManager object which only holds null references.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    playMusic(int index)
    Plays the Sound at the specified index within the music library.
    void
    playSoundEffect(int index)
    Plays the Sound at the specified index within the sound effects library.
    void
    start()
    Loads all of the Sounds.
    void
    stopAllMusic()
    Stops and restarts all Sounds in the music library which are currently playing.
    void
    stopAllSoundEffects()
    Stops and restarts all Sounds in the sound effects library which are currently playing.
    void
    stopMusic(int index)
    Stops and restarts the Sound at the specified index within the music library.
    void
    stopSoundEffect(int index)
    Stops and restarts the Sound at the specified index within the sound effects library.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundManager

      public SoundManager()
      Initializes a SoundManager object which only holds null references. Does not load the Sounds yet.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Loads all of the Sounds.

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic(int index)
      Plays the Sound at the specified index within the music library.
      Parameters:
      index - the specified index

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic(int index)
      Stops and restarts the Sound at the specified index within the music library.
      Parameters:
      index - the specified index

    • playSoundEffect

      public void playSoundEffect(int index)
      Plays the Sound at the specified index within the sound effects library. Ensures that the entire Sound clip is played for its entire duration.
      Parameters:
      index - the specified index

    • stopSoundEffect

      public void stopSoundEffect(int index)
      Stops and restarts the Sound at the specified index within the sound effects library.
      Parameters:
      index - the specified index

    • stopAllMusic

      public void stopAllMusic()
      Stops and restarts all Sounds in the music library which are currently playing.

    • stopAllSoundEffects

      public void stopAllSoundEffects()
      Stops and restarts all Sounds in the sound effects library which are currently playing.
